Class TicketPool

java.lang.Object
com.ticketing.ticketingsystem.ticketpool.TicketPool
public class TicketPool extends Object
Manages the pool of tickets in the ticketing system. Handles ticket addition and purchase, and ensures thread safety.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TicketPool(int maximumTicketCapacity, int totalTicketsToSell, ActivityWebSocketHandler webSocketController)
    Constructs a TicketPool instance with the specified maximum capacity, ticket count, and WebSocket handler.

  • Constructor Details

    • TicketPool

      public TicketPool(int maximumTicketCapacity, int totalTicketsToSell, ActivityWebSocketHandler webSocketController)
      Constructs a TicketPool instance with the specified maximum capacity, ticket count, and WebSocket handler.
      Parameters:
      maximumTicketCapacity - the maximum number of tickets the pool can hold.
      totalTicketsToSell - the total number of tickets available for sale.
      webSocketController - the WebSocket handler for broadcasting updates.

  • Method Details

    • addTicket

      public void addTicket()
      Adds a ticket to the pool. Waits if the pool is full or all tickets have been released.

    • buyTicket

      public Ticket buyTicket()
      Allows a customer to purchase a ticket. Waits if no tickets are available.
      Returns:
      the purchased Ticket, or null if no ticket is available.

    • shouldStop

      public boolean shouldStop()
      Checks if the simulation should stop. This happens when all tickets are released and sold.
      Returns:
      true if the simulation should stop, false otherwise.

    • allTicketsReleased

      public boolean allTicketsReleased()
      Checks if all tickets have been released.
      Returns:
      true if all tickets are released, false otherwise.

    • allTicketsSold

      public boolean allTicketsSold()
      Checks if all tickets have been sold.
      Returns:
      true if all tickets are sold, false otherwise.

    • getVendorIdForThread

      public int getVendorIdForThread()
      Gets the vendor ID for the current thread.
      Returns:
      the vendor ID.

    • getCustomerIdForThread

      public int getCustomerIdForThread()
      Gets the customer ID for the current thread.
      Returns:
      the customer ID.
